titles.title: Who Is On The Lord's Side Stand And Be Counted

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
Who is on the Lord's side, stand and be counted,
Who is on the Lord's side, walk with me,
Who is on the Lord's side, stand and be counted
For eternity.
As for me and my house, we will serve Him,
As for me and my house, we will stand,
Who is on the Lord's side, stand and be counted
For the promised land.
